org.vertx.java.core.http

Interface HttpServerFileUpload

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ExceptionSupport<HttpServerFileUpload>, ReadStream<HttpServerFileUpload>, ReadSupport<HttpServerFileUpload,Buffer>

    public interface HttpServerFileUpload
extends ReadStream<HttpServerFileUpload>
    Represents an upload from an HTML form.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.nio.charset.Charset charset()
      Returns the charset for the upload
      java.lang.String contentTransferEncoding()
      Returns the contentTransferEncoding for the upload
      java.lang.String contentType()
      Returns the contentType for the upload
      java.lang.String filename()
      Returns the filename which was used when upload the file.
      boolean isSizeAvailable()
      Returns true if the size of the upload can be retrieved via size().
      java.lang.String name()
      Returns the name of the attribute
      long size()
      Returns the size of the upload (in bytes)
      HttpServerFileUpload streamToFileSystem(java.lang.String filename)
      Stream the content of this upload to the given filename.
